plot: Bryan, Peter, Bob and Vivien are students, sharing a flat in London. Their life is one long round of socialising, parties and coffee bars. Occasionally, however, they have to do some work.
plot_en: Bryan, Peter, Bob and Vivien are students, sharing a flat in London. Their life is one long round of socialising, parties and coffee bars. Occasionally, however, they have to do some work.

title: The Eggheads
